title: What I do
subtitle: Whether you need a tool to automate manual tasks or an online application your customers can use, I can help you.

item.name: Analysis
item.description: It all starts with conversation. I analyze your existing processes and tools to determine if it makes sense to enhance what you have or start fresh.

item.name: Design
item.description: I look at how you operate and through an iterative design process we design a custom solution that meets your business needs.

item.name: Build
item.description: Once I begin building your software, I continue to work closely with you providing weekly releases for your review and feedback.

item.name: Deployment and support
item.description: It doesn’t end here. Even after we launch your application, I’m here to support you. I can regularly monitor your software and make sure that it is working correctly.

item.name: Updates and new features
item.description: As your business evolves, we can work together to update your application to continue improving your workflow.
